example.name: Simple Acceleration
example.description: Simple example provable with Groebner Basis backend.

example.name: Magnetic Field
example.description: Magnetic field example provable with Groebner Basis backend.

example.name: Simple ETCS
example.description: Essentials of the ETCS case study. Please note, that this is the simplest possible version of the safety requirement for the ETCS. The verification of the ETCS system itself requires a much more advanced model.

example.name: Water Tank
example.description: Standard water tank model, which regulates water level y between 1 and 12 by filling or emptying the water tank

example.name: Bouncing Ball
example.description: A fully parametric version of the bouncing ball that jumps up and down while being bounced back from the ground.

example.name: Controlled Moving Point
example.description: Simple example of a controlled moving point that moves towards zero.
